EmailTemplate.name: CSO Spares - Material Extension to HIS
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear MM Team,
Please investigate if these parts can be extended to HIS and update us on status of your investigation.
PN: XXX-XXX-XXX Part exists in SAP: Y/N MECH/AVION/Unknown: M/A/U Part exists in 1009/1014: 10XX Other info for part not in 1014 (CMM, End Item and NHA): etc (up to 9 parts)
Please respond to the shared email address from which you received this email and do not change subject of the email.
Thank you for your assistance. Regards, {!Case.OwnerName__c}
Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time
